Why do green olives come in jars and black olives come in cans?

Different varieties of olives are best preserved in different formats. Green olives need to breathe to maintain their crisp texture, so they are usually packaged in jars. Black olives are fermented in salty brines, so they are better preserved in cans, which are designed to retain moisture. The higher salt content of canned black olives also gives them a stronger taste.

Why are police always mean to black people?

Police brutality toward members of the black community is a longstanding and systemic issue in the United States, partially due to racism and bias that has been ingrained in law enforcement practices. This systemic issue often contributes to excessive uses of force, disproportionate arrests, and the inadequate and unequal treatment of African American individuals in the legal system. Even in instances when African Americans have the same crime rate or higher education and wealth levels than the national average, police still use unwarranted or excessive force against them. It is a deep-rooted systemic issue that can often result in unequal and unfair treatment that is disproportionate to the actions committed by those in the black community.

What kind of work can people with Downs syndrome do? I've often wondered about their mental capacities.

People with Down syndrome have a wide range of mental abilities. Many are able to work and independently manage their finances. In the US, most are employed through employment initiatives such as Supported Employment and Special Workshops. Those who cannot work have many other activities available such as attending college and living independently. There is much diversity in the abilities of people with Down syndrome. As for work, each person is unique in their skills and abilities, and some are better suited for some types of jobs while others for others. Generally, people with Down syndrome are able to hold a job with support and training. Some examples of work Down syndrome individuals may do are: working in customer service or retail settings, food preparation, office work such as data entry, or in production work environments. They can even start their own businesses like some of the many entrepreneurs with Down syndrome. Down syndrome does not define what a person is capable of achieving!

In a 2005 Ford Explorer, where are the brake lines located?

The brake lines on a 2005 Ford Explorer can be found behind the wheel well liners or in the rear wheel well. They run along the lower A-arm on the suspension in order to reach the front and rear brakes. They are also routed along the underside of the vehicle in order to reach the calipers on the rear brakes.

Tell me facts about Chinese people.

Chinese people form one of the most diverse ethnic groups in the world. Can you tell me how a home's electric meter works, in order to calculate my electricity usage?

An electrical meter measures the amount of electricity being used in a home or business. It works by monitoring the amount of electricity entering the building and then recording the number of kilowatt-hours (kWh) used. An electrical meter has two moving parts - an indicator and a register. The indicator displays the total number of kilowatt-hours used, while the register serves as a tally of electricity usage. Typically, an electric meter is read each month by utility companies in order to calculate the cost of electricity used.

Can a child lie about their age to go online to over 18 sites?

No, a child cannot legally lie about their age to go online to over 18 sites. Children younger than 13 will not be able to create an account until they reach the minimum age. Whats a good way to make paint peel off a wall?

A good way to make paint peel off a wall is to use a heat gun to warm up the wall and loosen the paint. Apply a coat of paint stripping gel over the entire area, using a brush or painting rag. Wait the recommended amount of time before peeling the paper back, starting with the edges and working towards the center.
